articles.description: Reaction as Virgil van Dijk signs a new two-year contract to stay at Liverpool.
articles.title: 'It's just incredible' - reaction as Van Dijk signs new Liverpool contract

articles.description: All the reaction to the Champions League as Arsenal reach the semi-finals with an aggregate win over Real Madrid.
articles.title: Champions League: Arsenal through to semi-finals after aggregate win over Real Madrid

articles.description: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk follows Mohamed Salah in signing a new deal with the club.
articles.title: Virgil van Dijk: Liverpool captain signs new deal

articles.description: Real Madrid's exit from the Champions League at the hands of Arsenal on Wednesday has put the future of manager Carlo Ancelotti and his players in the spotlight.
articles.title: Real Madrid: What next for Spanish giants and boss Carlo Ancelotti?

articles.description: Serena Williams says she would have been banned for 20 years had she committed a doping offence similar to that of men's player Jannik Sinner.
articles.title: Serena Williams on Jannik Sinner doping case: 'I would have been banned for 20 years'

articles.description: Former Ireland fly-half Johnny Sexton joins Andy Farrell's British and Irish Lions coaching team for this summer's tour of Australia.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Former Ireland captain Johnny Sexton joins Andy Farrell's backroom team

articles.description: On the night Arsenal secure their place in the Champions League semi-finals, BBC Sport looks at what has been called a "statement win"
articles.title: Real Madrid 1-2 Arsenal (agg 1-5): Arsenal reach Champions League semi-finals with 'statement' win

articles.description: Where does Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk rank amongst the best Premier League centre-backs ever?
articles.title: Virgil van Dijk: Is Liverpool captain the best Premier League centre-back ever?

articles.description: Tottenham face Eintracht Frankfurt in Europa League quarter-final second leg with questions growing around Ange Postecoglou's future. Is this a match he has to win to safeguard his future?
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou future: Is it now or never for Tottenham boss?

articles.description: Ukrainian Lesia Tsurenko says she will "seek justice in court" after being subjected to "moral abuse" by a WTA executive.
articles.title: Lesia Tsurenko: Ukrainian to take legal action after WTA 'moral abuse'
